data.attribute

Class AttributeSet

  • java.lang.Object
    • data.attribute.AttributeSet

  • public class AttributeSet
extends java.lang.Object
    Stores a set of attributes.
    Author:
    Matthew Bernstein - matthewb@cs.wisc.edu

      • printAttributeSet

        public void printAttributeSet()

      • addAttribute

        public void addAttribute(java.lang.String attrName,
                java.lang.Integer attrType,
                java.lang.String[] nominalValues)
        Add an attribute to the set of attributes.
        Parameters:
        attrName - - the name of the attribute
        attrType - - the type of attribute (i.e. nominal or continuous)
        nominalValues - - all nominal values if this is a nominal attribute. Set to null if this attribute is continuous

      • getAttributeById

        public Attribute getAttributeById(java.lang.Integer attrId)
        Get an attribute by its attribute ID.
        Parameters:
        attrId - - the attribute ID
        Returns:
        the attribute with this ID

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the attribute with this name

      • getNominalValueId

        public java.lang.Integer getNominalValueId(java.lang.String attrName,
                                  java.lang.String attrValue)
        Get the nominal value ID for a specific attribute name and nominal value of that attribute
        Parameters:
        attrName - the name of the target attribute
        attrValue - the name of the target nominal value
        Returns:
        the unique integer ID of that nominal value

      • getClassAttrId

        public java.lang.Integer getClassAttrId()
        Returns:

      • getClassAttrName

        public java.lang.String getClassAttrName()
